root.name: Freedom Fighter
root.description: Overview: You are a renegade freedom fighter whose mission is to stow aboard Train 999 en route to the enemy’s home base in space and destroy the evil Robot Guardian. While trying to get to the Train, you fight a variety of robots from soldiers and snipers to baseball players and hover-vehicles. When you lose a life, the game resets to the previous decision point and offers the player the chance to choose a different one.
